title.rendered: Women’s Padding Jacket With Faux Fur Trim Hood

excerpt.rendered:
• Mock collar and long sleeves with knit internal thumb-hole cuffs.
  • Full zip-front closure and a snap-button storm flap.
  • Adjustable drawstring at the waistline creates a cinched, feminine silhouette.
  • Snap-flap pockets with a stacked zipper pocket at the front and sleeve.
  • Finished with a smooth poly interior lining.
  • Straight hemline.
  • 100% nylon.
  • Lining: 100% polyester.
  • Machine wash, tumble dry.
